conversation.text: In the heart of the Tower of Beginnings, a young adventurer named Cael awakens. Before them stands the Keeper of Beginnings — a spectral figure, face hidden beneath a shifting veil of starlight.
You heard the call... and you answered. The Tower does not summon lightly.
I... think I dreamed of this place. But it felt more like a memory than a dream.
The line between dream and truth is thinner here. What matters is that you have arrived. But know this — each floor tests not what you are, but what you hide.
Why was I chosen?
You carry weight unseen, shadows you do not yet name. The Tower sees all. It listens. It judges.
Your first trial awaits — the Sky Bridge of the Ancients. You must ride the spectral bird through the bones of a city devoured by wind and time.
That... doesn't sound survivable.
It rarely is. But the Tower does not demand perfection — only persistence.
Fall, and you will begin again. The Tower will remember. So will your soul-mark.
...Alright. I'm ready. Let's begin.
Cael steps forward as a radiant bird made of swirling light descends from the sky. Its wings stir the dust of forgotten ages. Wind roars through the shattered arches above.
The Trial of the Winds begins.

scene_2.title: The Sky Bridge
content: You find yourself on a narrow bridge suspended in the sky.
The wind howls around you, and below, the ruins of an ancient city stretch out as far as the eye can see.
A spectral bird appears, ready to take you on your journey.
Click to continue...

scene_3.victory_message: You successfully navigated the Sky Bridge!
scene_3.defeat_message: You fell from the Sky Bridge. The Tower remembers your fall.

conversation.text: Winds scream across the sky as Cael clings to the spectral bird. With battered wings and unyielding will, they reach the far edge of the ruined city.
The Trial of the Winds is passed — though the soul-mark glows faintly, tallying each fall into the abyss.
*panting* I thought I was going to die up there... again.
*a whisper from nowhere* And yet you didn't. That makes you dangerous.
The spectral bird dissolves into mist. Cael lands in a narrow canyon, its floor scattered with strange, glimmering stones. The wind is gone — replaced by silence and tension.
What... is this place?
These are the Mines of Memory. Beneath your feet lie shards of war — echoes of pain that never faded.
Step lightly. Every wrong move awakens a fragment of sorrow. To find what you seek, you must remember what was never yours.
So now I have to suffer someone else's past too? This Tower really doesn't care who I was before.
Precisely. And the deeper you go, the less of yourself you'll recognize.
The air trembles with a thousand unseen voices. The mines await.

scene_5.title: The Mines of Memory
content: You step into the Mines of Memory, a dark and eerie place.
The walls are lined with strange, glowing stones that pulse with an otherworldly light.
You can feel the weight of countless memories pressing down on you.
Click to continue...

scene_6.victory_message: You successfully navigated the Mines of Memory!
scene_6.defeat_message: You triggered a memory trap. The Tower remembers your fall.

scene_7.title: The Keeper's Guidance
content: You emerge from the Mines of Memory, shaken but alive.
The Keeper of Beginnings awaits you at the entrance.
The spectral bird reappears, ready to take you to the next trial.
Click to continue...

conversation.text: Those shards... they weren't just memories. I felt their pain, their fear. It's like their echoes still linger here... in the very earth.
You carry their burden now... tread carefully, for what lies ahead is no less daunting.
A door... guarded by riddles. If these runes are any indication, it's not just a lock on the outside... but on the inside too.
The past and present are entwined. The puzzle is more than a test of logic. It's a test of resolve.
I'm ready. Whatever waits beyond, I'll face it. But... I need to be sure. Doubt is the real enemy.
Then solve the riddle... and confront the shadows within.

scene_9.title: The Valley of Soul Shards
content: You find yourself in a valley filled with glowing shards of light.
Each shard seems to pulse with a life of its own, whispering secrets of the past.
A door stands before you, covered in ancient runes.
Click to continue...

scene_10.victory_message: You solved the riddle and opened the door!
scene_10.defeat_message: You failed to solve the riddle. The Tower remembers your fall.

scene_11.title: The Keeper's Farewell
content: You step through the door and find yourself in a vast chamber filled with light.
The Keeper of Beginnings stands before you, a proud smile on their face.
You have completed the trials of the Tower.
Click to continue...

conversation.text: The rune puzzle... it tested more than my mind. These ancient symbols seem alive, like they're watching, waiting.
Every trial is a step deeper into the truth. The puzzle was a gate — not just in stone, but in spirit.
Beyond this hall lies the Vault of Secrets... a place where knowledge and power intertwine, guarded by arcane mechanisms.
Within the vault, you will face a different challenge. Not of brute strength, but of cunning and will.
I must prepare myself. The path grows darker, but I won't falter. Every secret I uncover brings me closer to understanding who I truly am.

scene_13.title: The Rune Gate Hall
content: You enter the Rune Gate Hall, a vast chamber filled with ancient runes and symbols.
The air is thick with magic, and the walls seem to pulse with energy.
A guardian spirit appears, ready to guide you through the next trial.
Click to continue...

clues: The first letter is the first letter of the word 'Secrets'.
The second letter is the third letter of the word 'Secrets'.
The third letter is the fifth letter of the word 'Secrets'.
The fourth letter is the last letter of the word 'Secrets'.
scene_14.victory_message: You solved the password and unlocked the Vault of Secrets!
scene_14.defeat_message: You failed to solve the password. The Vault remains sealed.

scene_15.title: The Keeper's Legacy
content: You step into the Vault of Secrets, a place of immense power and knowledge.
The Keeper of Beginnings stands before you, their form shimmering with ethereal light.
You have completed the trials of the Tower and proven your worth.
Click to continue...

conversation.text: The vault's password... It's more than a word. It's a memory I tried to bury.
Fear once held you prisoner, Cael. Only by facing it can the path forward be revealed.
I can feel the weight of those failed attempts... the shame, the doubt. But I must push onward.
Beware, too much failure will seal this place forever. Your mind may yet become your own worst enemy.
Next lies the Arena of Reflection — where I must face myself, not just my fears.
The duel within the mirror tests your soul and your will. Will you triumph, or be consumed?

scene_17.title: The Forgotten Vault
content: You enter the Forgotten Vault, a place of ancient secrets and forgotten knowledge.
The air is thick with dust, and the walls are lined with books and scrolls.
A vault echo appears, ready to guide you through the final trial.
Click to continue...

scene_18.victory_message: You won the duel in the Arena of Reflection!
scene_18.defeat_message: You lost the duel. The Arena remembers your fall.

scene_19.victory_message: You cleared the lines and proved your skill!
scene_19.defeat_message: You failed to clear the lines. The Tower remembers your fall.

scene_20.victory_message: You outwitted the two guards and moved forward!
scene_20.defeat_message: The guards stopped you. The Tower remembers your failure.

scene_21.victory_message: You survived the maze and mastered the shadows!
scene_21.defeat_message: You got caught in the shadows. The Tower remembers your fall.

scene_22.title: The Final Awakening
content: Having conquered the trials and faced your deepest fears, you stand at the heart of the Tower.
The shadows no longer haunt you; instead, they whisper of a new beginning.
The Tower's mysteries are yours to command.
Your journey has only just begun.

conversation.text: As the dust settles in the Vault, Cael feels a profound calm wash over them.
I came here seeking answers, but I found something far greater — myself.
The Tower tests all who enter, but only those who endure find their truth.
Then this is not the end, but the first step of many.
Go forth, adventurer. Your story will be told in the echoes of the Tower.
With a final glance back, Cael steps forward into the unknown, ready for whatever lies ahead.
